import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import { Editor, EditorState } from 'draft-js'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function CreateJobForm() { const [ editorState, setEditorState ] = React.useState(EditorState.createEmpty()); const [ jobSuccess, setJobSuccess ] = useState(''); const [ jobFailed, setJobFailed ] = useState(''); const editor = React.useRef(null); function focusEditor() { editor.current.focus(); } React.useEffect(() => { focusEditor(); }, []); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { title: '', description: '', min_salary: '', max_salary: '', company_name: '', job_location: '', last_date_to_submit: '', contact_email: '', contact_num: '', starting_date: '', technologies: [] }, onSubmit: (values, { resetForm }) => { (async () => { try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/job/create', values); resetForm({}); setJobSuccess('Congratulations!! Your job has been added! :D '); } catch (error) { setJobFailed( 'Something went wrong! Please check if you have filled everything currently or let me know your issue at devarifhossain@gmail.com' ); } })(); } }); return (
{jobSuccess && (
)} {jobFailed && (
)}
setEditorState(editorState)} />
